title: 20,000 leagues under the sea [study extract]
brief_description: From the book by Jules Verne. A breathtaking adventure aboard the “Nautilus”, the nuclear-powered submarine controlled by evil genius Captain Nemo. The cast includes James Mason, Kirk Douglas and Peter Lorne. The film prompts discussion about nuclear energy.
